metadata.title: CVE-2020-24829 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC v0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. It contains a heap-based buffer overflow in gf_m2ts_section_complete in media_tools/mpegts.c that can cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
